title: Groom, possibly Mr. Williams, wearing moustache, dark suit, light colored button down collared shirt, and dark necktie with clip and bride wearing light colored dress with pleated tulle overlay on skirt, patterned bodice with sweetheart neckline, and sheer shawl collar, sheer fingerless gloves and headband with veil, holding bouquet of flowers with ribbon, standing in interior in front of fireplace flanked with ferns on tall stands, upholstered sofa with fringed cushions, and side table with vase on right, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
